description:
"I heard you can easily make money." With that reason alone, Nico and Kanshi started the "Kan and Nico Channel." Morihito gets irritated about how ignorant Nico and Kanshi are towards creating videos to post online, so he asks their hipster poser classmate, Keigo Magami, for help.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kan & Nico’s Channel / Ceremonia herbaty to bułka z masłem
Kan & Nico’s Channel / Cérémonie du thé les doigts dans le nez
Kan Nico Channel / Ocha no Kokoro wa Ocha no Ko Saisai
Kan and Nico`s Channel / The Tea Ceremony Is a Piece of Tea Cake
カンニコチャンネル / お茶の心はお茶の子さいさい
